 2024-11092024-10-11FIN, GAC
ActCustoms Tariff
SubjectOrder Amending the China Surtax Order (2024)
PrecisOrder Amending the CHINA SURTAX ORDER (2024) in order to impose an additional surtax of 25 per cent on steel and aluminum produced in China and imported into Canada, effective October 22, 2024.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2024-0202 Publication Date: 2024-10-23
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Order Amending the CHINA SURTAX ORDER (2024) in order to impose an additional surtax of 25 per cent on steel and aluminum produced in China and imported into Canada, effective October 22, 2024.
